sentences.en: A few years ago I broke my leg and had a plaster cast on up to my hip.
sentences.cn: 几年前我把一条腿摔断了，石膏夹板一直固定到臀部。

sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: For some people, rap — the music of the hip-hop generation — is just so much noise.
sentences.cn: 对某些人来说，说唱乐——嘻哈一族的音乐——简直就是噪音。

sentences.en: He took a swig of whisky from his hip flask.
sentences.cn: 他猛灌了一口扁酒瓶中的威士忌.

sentences.en: Her ear, shoulder and hip are in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 她的耳朵、肩膀和髋部呈一条直线。

sentences.en: It may be that you are unaware of where your hip joint is; it is not at the waist but a good hand span below it.
sentences.cn: 这也许是因为你并不晓得髋关节的位置，它不在腰部，而是位于腰部以下一手拃宽处。

sentences.en: Judges don't have to shoot from the hip. They have the leisure to think, to decide.
sentences.cn: 法官们不必贸然行事。他们可以不慌不忙地去思考，去决定。

sentences.en: Pulling at his tunic, Omoro bared his left hip.
sentences.cn: 奥摩罗掀起他的外衣, 露出了他的左臀部.

sentences.en: She stood there with her hands on her hips glaring at him.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.en: She struck a pose, one hand on her hip and the other waving an imaginary cigarette.
sentences.cn: 她摆了个姿势，一只手叉腰，另一只手夹着一支假想的香烟。

sentences.en: She tripped and fell last night and broke her hip.
sentences.cn: 她昨晚绊倒了，摔坏了髋骨。

sentences.en: The group's debut album was immediately acclaimed a hip hop classic.
sentences.cn: 这个组合的首张专辑一经推出便被盛赞为嘻哈乐的经典之作。

sentences.en: The hip-hugging black and white polka-dot dress was the height of fashion.
sentences.cn: 黑白圆点花纹的紧身连衣裙当时是最时尚的。

sentences.en: The new coats blouse gracefully above the hip line.
sentences.cn: 新外套在臀围线上优美地打着褶皱.

sentences.en: The old lady had fallen and broken her hip.
sentences.cn: 那老妇人摔了一跤，髋部骨折。

sentences.en: Three cheers for the winner — hip, hip, hooray!
sentences.cn: 为胜利者欢呼三声——嗨, 嗨, 万岁!

sentences.en: Three cheers for the winner: Hip, hip, hurray!
sentences.cn: 为胜利者欢呼三声: 加油, 加油, 加油!

trans.tran_cn: （衣服、音乐等方面）时髦的，赶时髦的
trans.tran_en: doing things or done according to the latest fashion

trans.tran_cn: 臀部，[建筑学]屋脊，臀围（尺寸），臀部…的
trans.tran_en: one of the two parts on each side of your body between the top of your leg and your waist
